sentences.en: Apple's continued glory eats away at me like a maggot at my core.
sentences.cn: 苹果(Apple)一直以来的荣耀,就像蛆虫一样啃噬着我的心.

sentences.en: He's got some maggot in his head.
I never a single worm on the hook , preferring a cocktail of worm and maggot.
sentences.cn: 我从不单用一只虫作“钓饵”, 而喜欢用虫和蛆的混合物.

sentences.en: I never use a single worm on the hook , preferring a cocktail of worm and maggot.
sentences.cn: 我从不单用一只虫作钓饵, 而喜欢用虫和蛆的混合物.

sentences.en: I never use a single worm onhook, preferring a cocktail of worm and maggot.
sentences.cn: 我从不单用一只“虫”作钓饵, 而喜欢用“虫”和蛆的混合物.

sentences.en: Maggot medicine, in fact, has a long history.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 蛆疗法由来已久.

sentences.en: Patriotism is a maggot in their heads.
sentences.cn: 爱国主义是他们脑袋里的蛆.

sentences.en: Paul has got a maggot in his head on everything connected with abstract art.
sentences.cn: 凡是与抽象艺术有关的问题,保尔总有些奇怪的想法.

sentences.en: Sam: You miserable little maggot! I'll stove your head in!
sentences.cn: 山姆: 你这条该死的蛆! 我要把你的脑袋丢到炉子里烤!

sentences.en: The scale that how implements fly maggot to breed is changed?
sentences.cn: 如何实现蝇蛆养殖的规模化?

sentences.en: Wait like bug of maggot of bee, fly, yellow pink, batty moth, cockroach, mole cricket.
sentences.cn: 如蜜蜂 、 蝇蛆 、 黄粉虫 、 蝙蝠蛾 、 蟑螂 、 蝼蛄等.

sentences.en: When the maggot bites, he will go fishing in the rain.
sentences.cn: 他有时心血来潮, 会冒着雨走去钓鱼.

sentences.en: You're not even a low - life scum - sucking maggot!
sentences.cn: 你还不如低等动物,吃屎的蛆!

sentences.en: You're not even a lowlife, scum - sucking maggot!
sentences.cn: 你还不如低等生物, 吃屎的蛆!

sentences.en: You've been into Farmer Maggot's crop!
sentences.cn: 你们又来农夫马嗄的田里偷东西了!

phrases.tran_cn: (爱尔兰， 非正式)傻里傻气地逗乐

trans.tran_en: a small creature like a  worm  that is the young form of a  fly  and lives in decaying food, flesh etc
